data.title: Longfellow Finnegan Riddle Funeral Home
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - Longfellow Finnegan Riddle Funeral Home offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving Anaconda, MT and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
data.meta_site_name: All Obituaries | Longfellow Finnegan Riddle Funeral Home | Anaconda MT funeral home and cremation
data.text:
We stand ready to assist you. If a death has occurred, please call us on the number below:

1-406-563-3371
